entry.title: Farmhouse Fig by Modern Farmhouse Family Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Farmhouse Fig is a bright medley of sweet plum, blackberry, and rhubarb, wrapped in a fresh bouquet of fig leaves, wild florals, and cozy woods. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Sarah @ModernFarmhouseFamily!

"The combination of fruits, florals, and the outdoors makes Farmhouse Fig the perfect fragrance to burn year round...Once you smell this candle, I really believe you will fall in love the way I already have."

Get each candle for only $32.50 each when you purchase a bundle of two (Save $11!!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (128 hours total).

This fresh and floral fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly blends both brightness and warmth to create a uniquely cozy atmosphere in your home.


INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.
Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Forest Green Taper Candles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 9.60

Capture the classic, elegant look of real, hand dipped taper candles! This set includes two 10” wax Taper Candles. The perfect way to create a stunning centerpiece or tablescape any time of year. 

This set of two wax taper candles are an beautiful forest green, "standard" size (fit in any standard taper holder), are no drip, smokeless, and are hand dipped by Made Market Co. in the USA. 

Do not leave burning candles unattended. 

BURN TIME: 8 hours 

DIMENSIONS: 0.75” x 10” ("standard" taper base width; exact width may vary due to hand dipped nature of the candles)  

SET WEIGHT: 3.2 oz (90.7g) 

Shop more Home Décor and Candle Looks in our décor shop.

entry.title: Home for the Holidays by Madison Vining Bundle of Four
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 4
Price: 106.40

Home for the Holidays smells exactly like that: coming home for the holidays. It’s the warmth of a friendly hug when you walk through the door, the nostalgia of family traditions, and the joy of time spent together. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Madison @madisonviningblog.

"I wanted it to smell like, that is, the feeling of coming home to a place that is your soft place to land, where you're accepted and loved without question. I think we nailed it.

Get each candle for only $26.60 each when you purchase a bundle of four! (Save $45.60!)

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time per candle (256 hours total). This fresh and earthy fragrance features a moderate strength and an aroma of orange peel and sweet citrus with refreshing notes of apple, berry, and eucalyptus, intertwined in a nostalgic, cozy blend of balsam, pine, cedar, and sandalwood.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural, paraffin free soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Sulfate free, phthalate free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Nativity Fragrance Warmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 22.80

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame when you pair our Soy Wax Melts with our Nativity Fragrance Warmer! This Christmas fragrance/melt warmer features antique brushed, copper cut to reveal a glowing nativity scene. A perfect way to reflect on the reason for the season on a cozy, silent night.

Simply place 6-12 Soy Wax Melts into the warmer, flip the warmer on with a simple on/off switch on the cord, and enjoy up to 13 hours of cozy fragrance with a soothing, ambient glow. The removable dish also makes changing out your wax easy to ensure your home is always filled with delightful smells.

INCLUDES: NP5 Warming Bulb (25W 120V). 3 ft cord with easy-to-use on/off switch. 1 Year limited warranty.

DIMENSIONS: 8.8" x 4.6" x 4.6"

 

This warmer features a one-of-a-kind glaze or hand-painted design; the final finish may vary.

Enjoy more Soy Wax Melt products.

entry.title: Ultimate Christmas Candle Testers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type:
Price: 95.00

Restocked in limited quantities while supplies last!

Decide our next Christmas candle! 🎄Celebrate the season with smells inspired by favorite holiday traditions. Burn four of the coziest and warmest scents EVER in your home and cast your vote for ONE winner...Which scent will you choose? 👇

Gingerbread House: A reminder of Christmas traditions, with the nostalgic scent of gingerbread cookies and holiday spices, highlighted by rich icing and sweet almond.
Cinnamon Bun: The feeling of waking up on Christmas morning to the irresistible scent of warm, freshly baked cinnamon buns with a sugary vanilla swirl and topped with rich, homemade cream cheese icing.
Spiced Orange: Captures the festive spirit of the holidays with a sweet aroma of sugared orange and citrus with spiced notes of cinnamon bark and clove bud, intertwined with vanilla bean and cozy musk.
Holiday Spice: The warm cozy feeling of all those special family moments spent around the tree with the delightful medley of red apple and orange peel with a spiced blend of cinnamon sticks, clove bud, and cozy nutmeg, highlighted by ginger and sweet vanilla sugar.

As an ✨official✨ Ultimate candle tester, you’ll receive:
  • Four exclusive 16 oz candles in never-before-smelled scents;
  • A unique Candle Tester Survey to make your voice heard (extended into January!), and an AMAZING 30% off coupon after completing the survey;
  • PLUS early access to the winning fragrance before anyone else! 🙌
That's a $152 value! All our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting, and even burn. We use premium fragrance oils and 100% lead-free cotton wicks. All candles are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.

 

Rekindle memories of holidays past as you create new ones this year with a fun experience for the whole family. ❤️

entry.title: Cookie Stovetop Simmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 20.40

Elevate the cozy atmosphere of your home in a new way—Limited Edition Stovetop Simmers! “Do I Smell Cookies” Stovetop Simmer features festive, sweet, spicy fragrance notes to capture the delicious smell of homemade holiday treats. Sustainably sourced ingredients include: crystalized ginger, cinnamon, vanilla, star anise, cloves, nutmeg, cardamom, and almonds. 

This Stovetop Simmer is hand selected and filled by Dry Good Refillery in Montclair, NJ.  

HOW TO USE: Simply pour the contents into a pot of water, simmer on low, and enjoy all day! The contents can be reused up to 3 times. When finished, the ingredients are compostable and the glass jar can be repurposed. 

Please note this product is NOT intended for consumption. Use only as intended. 

DIMENSIONS: 2” x 2” x 6” 

WEIGHT: 12 oz (340.19 g) 

Shop more Home Décor and Candle Looks in our décor shop.

entry.title: Country Pine by Allie Boss Bundle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Bundle of 2
Price: 65.00

Country Pine is a breath of fresh air. The crisp blend of fir, cedar, and blue spruce paired with orange zest and sweet berries are like a peaceful walk through the woods on a cool evening. With lavender and sandalwood, it’s a soothing invitation to take it slow, and enjoy the quiet moments of home in the countryside. This NEW fragrance is a one-of-a-kind, exclusive creation in collaboration with our friend Allie @alliemboss!

entry.title: Tree Farm Soy Wax Melts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Soy Wax Melt
Price: 18.00

Selling out, and going fast!

Enjoy your favorite fragrances without the flame with Wax Melts that offer more, longer-lasting scents than ever before in a mess-free and easy to store bag. 

Tree Farm is a trip down memory lane to favorite holiday traditions. It’s the joy of bundling up and heading to the tree farm to find the perfect Christmas tree with family. Walking through the trees, the air is filled with the scent of freshly trimmed evergreens, Fraser fir, and cedar. The familiar, cozy feeling of laughter and the excitement of bringing home a special tree to light up your home are truly the magic of the season.

This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Natalie @vintageporch, featuring a strong strength that is a staple for the season.

“It's the whole ‘family Christmas’ feeling you get when you smell the pine scent. You turn on the music…you light the candle...it’s CHRISTMAS!” 

The 4 oz Soy Wax Melts bag includes approximately 55 cubes for up to 65 hours to total fragrance burn time.

All our melts are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting burn every time. We use premium fragrance oils hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.! All melts are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free.


WEIGHTS: 4.0 oz (113.4 g)
DIMENSIONS: 6.25" x 5.75"

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”


Enjoy these and other fragrances in our curated candle bundles + save up to $35.

entry.title: Tree Farm 16 oz candle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: 16 oz Candle
Price: 38.00

Selling out, and going fast!

Tree Farm is a trip down memory lane to favorite holiday traditions. It’s the joy of bundling up and heading to the tree farm to find the perfect Christmas tree with family. Walking through the trees, the air is filled with the scent of freshly trimmed evergreens, Fraser fir, and cedar. The familiar, cozy feeling of laughter and the excitement of bringing home a special tree to light up your home are truly the magic of the season.

 This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Natalie @vintageporch!

“It's the whole ‘family Christmas’ feeling you get when you smell the pine scent. You turn on the music…you light the candle...it’s CHRISTMAS!”

BURN TIME + STRENGTH: Up to 64 hours of burn time. This earthy fragrance features a strong strength that is a staple for the season.

INGREDIENTS: Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with a clean, long-lasting, and even burn thanks to high-quality materials.

  • 100% natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans.
  • Premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!)
  • 100% lead-free cotton wicks.
  • Paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5” x 3” x 3”

Enjoy Tree Farm in additional sizes and products.
